data.text: @amazon Her name is Izzy! :)
Got some amazon packages and had sibling open them and put them under the tree for me. Thank you santa's elves #tbtbsanta
@amazon Hahaha she's super creative. Loves to make stuff, arts & crafts, drawing, painting, etc. She's a smart cookie for sure 😂❤
I love Amazon Fresh. I can have all my groceries delivered in two hours 🙌🏻 https://t.co/8qcBdOh3wy
This purple wig is so pretty! Amazon is awesome for wigs. I'm barely getting by mentally at work and doing this is an amazing release for me. https://t.co/mqQaSWCf6a

When your parents live out of state and they bought your presents on Amazon but you also buy shit on Amazon so you have to ask permission to open your own packages cause you don’t want to ruin Christmas https://t.co/rDikf3T7qe
Amazon never fail me ain’t lying 🤣🥴.
Christmas time is oh so cozy at my apartment! 1st Christmas here& I absolutely love it! ❤️🌟🎄✨ My Christmas tree skirt is from @amazon 🥰 https://t.co/NUdM88qenq

Working on school stuff with my 6yo daughter*

6yo: How do you spell 'want'?

Me: Try to sound it out, please.

6yo: ALEXA! HOW DO YOU SPELL WANT?!

Alexa: Want is spelled... w-a-n-t

Me:...

Alexa is now muted.

#parenting #dadlife #alexastop
Dear Amazon prime, you a real one for those of us who have to wait till payday to buy Christmas presents. ‘Preciate ya
Why yes, I did search for “Bulbasaur Planter” on Amazon because I was looking to make my desk a little more adorable. https://t.co/ukbXCyP3Pd

Welp people, momlady sezs “time to send the returns back to Amazon”😹😹😹
Winkie be jokin ya. They not send me back😼😼🐾they lubs me https://t.co/unFaCZpR5z

I have to give a HUGE shoutout to @amazon for hooking myself and my little fur family up with some gifts! Jackson & Lincoln love their gifts. I'm super excited I got the tetris lights I've been looking at for awhile! We are so grateful that you did this for us. Thank you!!💕 https://t.co/HBqWYAk4G4

Max: Mom!! Amazon messed up my order! I ordered treats but they sent me a kitten in a box!! 😺🐾 Can we send her back?? 😹🐾 
We hope everyone is having a nice Sunday ☀️

#CatsOfTwitter  #cats #catboxsunday https://t.co/9lXlpPQk6Q
I need to order so much stuff on amazon 😩
@amazon I recently purchased a magnetic phone holder from you and I pulled it off and it’s cracked my phone https://t.co/vRgTDbGmKB
I’m excited to get my supernatural merch I’ve ordered off of Amazon in the mail new shirt, new string bag and my dean amulet necklace to come in yes 👍
I ordered 3 books from Amazon, 2 books came yesterday & one arrived this morning~❤💕❤ https://t.co/9qN1BVh6rA
Amazon prime has been my best friend. Need something for the baby? Bet order it real quick, here within hours or the next day. LIFESAVER 😆
God I love my echo products!! I just used my echo show to broadcast revile through my whole house to wake up my daughters!! #prouddadmoment oh FYI they weren’t amused!
Amazon prime is amazing lol
How brilliant is this - my @amazon delivery vehicle is a sleigh😆🎅🏻🎄 https://t.co/XNASd20MaE
@AmazonHelp I submitted my info, thanks!
Finally done with all my Christmas shopping. Thank you Amazon
Just came in from @amazon.. These guys look awesome!! #mickeymouse https://t.co/70xwtdZ90Q
ordered a new phone case from Amazon this morning and they already delivered it last night !!!! 10/10 would recommend !
I’m only grocery shopping with @AmazonFresh from now on, my experience has been amazing they got all my monies 😩😩😩😩
Amazon Prime is the best 😁
Shoutout to Amazon!!!
I have so many packages to wrap, is it acceptable to leave them under the tree in the Amazon packaging. This is the year to do it
Should I just go ahead and start buying things off my Amazon list for myself
@amazon love you guys
One of the BEST $10 purchases I've made off Amazon!!! https://t.co/ophw9LjGNR
My first Christmas orders from Amazon came in today and I am SO EXCITED 🥰
can’t believe this is my first time shopping for groceries on amazon... such a time saver!
@amazon Thank you for the wonderful gifts Liam is sure to enjoy them.❤️❤️❤️🎁
:) when i see Amazon packages
Can we talk about how the Amazon van on the app has changed to a sleigh so cute! https://t.co/Jd3vKA36it
Someone delete my Amazon app please 🥴🙏 https://t.co/afZzY7f9Na
Amazon gift wrapping is continually the best $5 I ever spend all year.
Love you @amazon and ur amazing customer service
@amazon @amazon they would love that, details sent

The pandemic has foisted upon all of us so many new things. 

Some awful, most crappy, but a few ok.

The daily arrival of the Amazon Prime truck with the evening’s #Hanukkah gifts is the closest many of us Jews will get to a Santa experience. And it’s pretty pretty good.
@amazon He’s a huge @Roblox & @_GeometryDash_  fan! Likes to build his own world. Not sure where he gets it.😊
Just got an Amazon package and I honestly don’t remember what I ordered this time 🤦🏽‍♀️

When making a list of MVPs for the year, Black women deserve to be singled out. Doing far more than their share!

I’m partnering w/ @amazonmusic to give back to @EmwgI. Proud to join Amazon in fulfilling Amazon Smile charity lists this holiday season. 🎁🌟 #DeliveringSmiles
.@amazon doesn't need to make a Christmas Alexa ad now. https://t.co/iTiMeKnzjA
@amazon how do I get your delivery guys to stop pulling up on my private land swapping delivery parcels and shouting out loud while I’m trying to work?
I ordered something from Amazon yesterday it’s already out for delivery 😂
